item.title: 3 shot, 1 stabbed in Christmas night dispute at Phoenix airport, police say

item.title: What is Boxing Day? All about the celebration's origin and traditions
item.description: Boxing Day 2024 is here, but not all Americans understand the meaning of the holiday celebrated in countries like the U.K. and Canada.

item.title: Prison guard dead after Christmas morning assault by inmate, officials say
item.description: A corrections officer died after an assault by an inmate in an Ohio prison on Christmas morning, authorities say.
